title: Vertx thread blocked at startup
body:
### Describe the bug

When starting the dev mode on my machine on a fresh Quarkus project (for instance, just downloading a new app with no extensions from _code with quarkus_), I am getting some thread blocked at dev mode startup time. It does the same when starting the Jar file.
It does not prevent the app to start properly, but it delays the startup time of dozens of seconds.

### Expected behavior

The application should start (almost) straight away without any thread blocked.being 

### Actual behavior

Here is the full stack trace:

```
$ ./mvnw compile quarkus:dev
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ---------------------< org.acme:code-with-quarkus >---------------------
[INFO] Building code-with-quarkus 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.2.Final:generate-code (default) @ code-with-quarkus ---
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-resources-plugin:2.6:resources (default-resources) @ code-with-quarkus ---
[INFO] Using 'UTF-8' encoding to copy filtered resources.
[INFO] Copying 2 resources
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-compiler-plugin:3.8.1:compile (default-compile) @ code-with-quarkus ---
[INFO] Changes detected - recompiling the module!
[INFO] Compiling 1 source file to C:\Users\vleon\Downloads\code-with-quarkus\target\classes
[INFO]
[INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.2.Final:dev (default-cli) @ code-with-quarkus ---
[INFO] Invoking org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-resources-plugin:2.6:testResources) @ code-with-quarkus

2021-11-14 13:51:24,439 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Profile dev activated. Live Coding activated.
2021-11-14 13:51:24,442 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Installed features: [cdi, resteasy, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]
```

### How to Reproduce?

I just downloaded the zip from code with Quarkus, unzipped, and launched the Maven command (n.b., same issue with Gradle).
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24693144/141681999-8de10b89-460e-4c31-a212-f238646932f9.png)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.18363.1854]

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.10" 2021-01-19 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment 18.9 (build 11.0.10+9-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM 18.9 (build 11.0.10+9-LTS, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

N/A

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.4.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1

### Additional information

I would tend to think that the issue is somehow linked to my machine, as my googling of this issue has been unsuccessful, but I have no idea on how to investigate this...
